name: Lorelei Harbour
bible_verse: John 3:16 - For God so loved the world that he gave his only begotten Son - that whosoever should believeth in him may not perish, but everlasting life. Isn't that the greatest bible verse you ever did hear?
question_1: What do you want your grandkids to be when they grow up?
answer_1: Roller coaster testers. I'm serious, that would just be the coolest thing in the whole entire world. I hope they get called to go all over the country and test every single roller coaster that there is.
question_2: Impressive useless talent that is so dumb I mean it
answer_2: Im really good at balancing stuff on my head. Like no seriously - I'm a world class pro. Wanna see? Come find me.
question_3: Favorite camp memory that you won't shut up about
answer_3: Guy making oatmeal with dirty sock water. He literally took off his sock, wrang out the water, and made oatmeal with it. I still can't believe it.
